cause.description:
There has been some media attention recently about the plight of child carers in the UK. Here are two articles which help to explain the situation:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/pages/live/articles/news/news.html?in_article_id=453794&in_page_id=1770 http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/comment/columnists/minette_marrin/article1782092.ece
I have started this "cause" to help to raise awareness of the situation. I am NOT asking for donations, just for you to join and to raise the profile of this often ignored, but very important subject.
Please see http://www.carers.org for more.
1. that there should be more help for child carers
cause.name: Child Carers: The Situation In The UK
